Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/10/0xeccc636a5f6aee792f509daae43ef68934b062a0.sol#728-759) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/10/0xeccc636a5f6aee792f509daae43ef68934b062a0.sol#746-759)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/10/0xeccc636a5f6aee792f509daae43ef68934b062a0.sol#743-759)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xeccc636a5f6aee792f509daae43ef68934b062a0.sol#294-296)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xeccc636a5f6aee792f509daae43ef68934b062a0.sol#277)
MintableToken.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xeccc636a5f6aee792f509daae43ef68934b062a0.sol#955-956)
